About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hey there! I'm Rylan and My love for design, creating, and technology has turned me into a front-end web developer, currently based in Halifax. I write clean, code while creating engaging websites that are aesthetic and accessible to all users. When I’m giving my laptop the opportunity to cool down, I’m browsing on Amazon for some new smart tech, playing some Gang Beast, or spending quality time with my puppy.
